protein.specific_function: Regulates the GDP/GTP exchange reaction of the Rho proteins by inhibiting the dissociation of GDP from them, and the subsequent binding of GTP to them

reference.reference_text: Scherle P, Behrens T, Staudt LM: Ly-GDI, a GDP-dissociation inhibitor of the RhoA GTP-binding protein, is expressed preferentially in lymphocytes. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1993 Aug 15;90(16):7568-72.
